string.text: Offer your help to the leader of the neutral squad.
Respond to the call for help.
Help the rookie leave the Dump
Kill the bandits by the tunnel
Escort the rookie to the cordon
The quest to get through to the bar.
Tell the rookie that the way is clear
Find out about Sharpshooter from Grey.
A new bandit raid is about to begin at the abandoned vehicle graveyard where Demon and his friends have dug in. Help them fight off the bandits.
There's been a shootout at the abandoned vehicle graveyard between neutral forces and bandits. The neutrals managed to fight the bandits off but are calling for help.
